Text:
The only ripper who's movies work natively on all 3 of my Androids, my 360s and my PS3.  

Great for taking movies to friends on tablet then using MediaShare to stream over wifi.  720 is perfect and quality looks awesome for file size.

Great job man :-)
thanks guy, that's a great video. :)
